}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "WE701-IF" and "REV D" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This device is a [[CyberTAN WE701-I]]. The FCC ID of the WE701-I (N89-WE701I) has also been assigned to this entry.
The PCI ID is per the drivers provided by '''Symbol'''. :It would ''appear'' that this device is using ISL3890. :The device description string in the driver is <small>'''Symbol LA-5030 Wireless Networker 802.11a/g CardBus Adapter'''</small>.
The OUI in this entry is per a US-acquired (presumably Worldwide variant) LA-5030-102-WW. :This device was specifically noted as being Made in China. The existing Taiwan CoM is, thus, being overwritten. It may be possible that there are multiple CoO for this device.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
